title: New Money
lyrics:
Yeah Woah woah woah
Okay Listen
Bigger appraisal on my AP
All these broke niggas hate me
Money long so lengthy
VVS on my pinky

Gucci fanny fuck a pocket

Plugged in like a socket

Career shooting like a rocket

They refresh till I drop it (ooh)



Niggas be Talking but ain't bout that action

Bet when they see me ain't nothing gon happen

Six bitches hop in the Bimmer no cappin

Four seater coupe so I had em all lap'ing

Used to be broke used to sleep on the floor

I just dropped forty racks at the store

Google my net worth then times it by four

That's disrespectful they know I got more



Niggas be Talking but ain't bout that action

Bet when they see me ain't nothing gon happen

Used to be broke used to sleep on the floor

New wave new money

Young niggas getting paid

I just turned 20

Already got millions aye

Smoking gelato big checks and the paper

I'm used to Henny I don't need no chaser

Your diamonds foo foo and cloudy like vaper

That girl a eater she fucked off my taper

Hating ass niggas is furious now

I bet they taking me serious now

Who is this nigga they curious now

All of my millions mysterious now

They don't wanna see me win

They don't wanna see me blow

They don't wanna hear the flow

But ion give a fuck no mo' ayy

Old relationships lessons learned so i right all my wrongs

But fuck that I'm dissing all of my exes in all of my songs

Bridges burn after fucking with me

You fall off after fucking with me

You get left after fucking with me

You better off never fucking with me



Niggas be Talking but ain't bout that action

Bet when they see me ain't nothing gon happen

Six bitches hop in the Bimmer no cappin

Four seater coupe so I had em all lap'ing

Used to be broke used to sleep on the floor

I just dropped forty racks at the store

Google my net worth then times it by four

That's disrespectful they know I got more
